code: import{useEffect,useState}from"react";import{useAppDispatch,useAppSelector}from"../../../../../../../../store/hooks";import{dispatchCaptchaResult,generateCaptcha}from"../../../../../../../../store/slices/exchange";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Captcha=()=>{const[result,setResult]=useState('');const{num1,num2,isValid}=useAppSelector(state=>state.exchange.captcha);const dispatch=useAppDispatch();useEffect(()=>{if(!num1&&!num2){dispatch(generateCaptcha());}},[]);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"exchange__block-wrapper",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"exchange__block-text",children:"ENTER CAPTCHA"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"exchange__block-captcha",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{className:"exchange__block-input exchange__block-input-captcha exchange__block-input-captcha-first-num",readOnly:true,type:"number",value:num1}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"exchange__block-sign",children:"+"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{className:"exchange__block-input exchange__block-input-captcha exchange__block-input-captcha-second-num",readOnly:true,type:"number",value:num2}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"exchange__block-sign",children:"="}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{className:isValid?"exchange__block-input exchange__block-input-captcha exchange__block-input-captcha-sum":"exchange__block-input exchange__block-input-captcha exchange__block-input-captcha-sum exchange_wrong_captcha",type:"number",value:result,onChange:e=>{setResult(e.target.value);dispatch(dispatchCaptchaResult(e.target.value));},name:"captchaResult",required:true})]})]});};export default Captcha;
